name: Bart de Keijzer
content: Bart De Keijzer | King's College London Skip to main contentDr Bart De Keijzer Deputy Head of the Distributed AI Research Group and Informatics Finance Hub ChampionSenior Lecturer in Computer ScienceResearch interestsComputer scienceContact details+44 020 7848 1807bart.de_keijzer@kcl.ac.ukBiographyBart De Keijzer is a Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, in the Department of Informatics at King's College London. Bart's research is in the intersection of economics and theoretical computer science. He studied Computer Science at the Delft University of Technology, and obtained his PhD in algorithmic game theory at the Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica (CWI) and Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam. Bart has held post-doctoral research positions at Sapienza University of Rome, CWI Amsterdam and the University of Liverpool, and was a lecturer at the University of Essex prior to joining King's.
